mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stu_board ( stu_title, stu_content, stu_createdDate, stu_local, stu_lang ) VALUES ( #{stuTitle}, #{stuContent}, NOW(), #{stuLocal}, #{stuLang} )
mapper.select: SELECT stu_id, stu_title, stu_local, stu_lang, stu_hitCnt, DATE_FORMAT(stu_createdDate, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS stu_createdDate FROM stu_board ORDER BY stu_id DESC
SELECT stu_id, stu_title, stu_content, stu_local, stu_lang, stu_hitCnt, DATE_FORMAT(stu_createdDate, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS stu_createdDate FROM stu_board WHERE stu_id = #{stuId}
mapper.update: UPDATE stu_board SET stu_hitCnt = stu_hitCnt + 1 WHERE stu_id = #{stuId}
UPDATE stu_board SET stu_title = #{stuTitle}, stu_content = #{stuContent}, stu_local = #{stuLocal}, stu_lang = #{stuLang}, stu_createdDate = Now() WHERE stu_id = #{stuId}
